events.title: Community Clean-up
events.summary: Volunteer-led clean-up of the central park. Bring gloves; refreshments provided.

events.title: Fundraising Fun Run
events.summary: Family-friendly 5K run to raise funds for local projects. Registration required.

events.title: Volunteer Induction Evening
events.summary: Info session and short training for new volunteers.

events.title: Sponsor Meet & Greet
events.summary: Presentations and Q&A for potential sponsors and partners.
